entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 27 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023
